basics.name: Yacine Bouraoui
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior software engineer and Engineering Manager with 14+ years of expertise in building scalable real-time systems, from fintech trading engines to AI-powered data intensive SaaS platforms. Proven track record of technical leadership, successful startup exit (TrafficPartner), and expertise in Rust, Python, TypeScript, and cloud-native architectures.

work.name: lili.ai
work.position: Engineering Manager and Senior Fullstack Developer
work.summary: Building an AI-empowered SaaS helping big construction actors analyze, understand and identify risks related to big construction projects.
highlights: Implemented massive data ingestion pipelines with NLP, analytics, models evaluation and ML pipelines using LLM (Llama 3, Qwen) and BERT models
Developed full-stack search engine with automatic document classification, RAG, and annotations
Led migration from monolithic architecture to serverless microservices and event-driven architecture
Tech stack: Rust (tokio, tonic, diesel, pyo3), Python (pytorch, langchain), VueJS, Postgres, Elasticsearch, Kafka, Kubernetes on Azure

work.name: TrafficPartner
work.summary: Joined early-stage startup developing live video chat solution with whitelabelling, automatic moderation, analytics and billing. Product used by luckycrush.live and other dating platforms.
highlights: Achieved 1.2M+ EUR monthly turnover and 15M users
Successfully exited - startup acquired by TrafficPartner
Responsible for all technical aspects: full-stack development, SecOps, DevOps, support, and hiring
Network programming in Rust involving real-time communication with TCP/UDP, WebRTC and HLS media streaming
Tech stack: Rust, TypeScript, React Native, WASM, cross-compilation, NATS, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Google Cloud, TimescaleDB

work.name: Netkin
work.summary: Developed virtual and physical events management solution from scratch. Led team of 8 developers.
highlights: Built video conferencing system using WebRTC and DASH/HLS for virtual events
Implemented CI/CD pipelines in GitLab
Architected microservices and event-driven systems on Kubernetes
Mentored junior engineers and collaborated on technical roadmap with CTO
Tech stack: TypeScript, Rust, nginx/openresty, Kubernetes, CouchDB, Kafka, Redis

work.name: CloudNetCare
work.summary: Built 'test as a service' solution (similar to SauceLabs) providing resources for automated end-user testing with VMs, browsers, OS choices, mobile device emulators, and load testing features.
highlights: Migrated monolithic application to distributed, fault-tolerant microservices architecture
Integrated performance engineering, resources orchestration, virtualization, distributed tracing and monitoring tools
Tech stack: C#, JavaScript, Docker, cloud-init, ELK, Azure, Postgres

work.name: Antvoice (Contractor)
work.summary: Startup helping clients improve online advertising and pretargeting through efficient recommendation algorithms.
highlights: Implemented and maintained recommendation algorithms and data/analytics processing pipelines
Focused on performance engineering and optimization
Tech stack: C#, python, TypeScript, Docker, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Spark, Google Cloud

work.name: SmartAdServer (Contractor)
work.summary: Contributed to building solutions for programmatic advertising.
highlights: Implemented highly performing RTB (Real-Time-Bidding) engine with reactive, event-driven architecture.
Timeseries forecasting for inventory optimization and optimized ad targeting and ad campaigns performance
Tech stack: C#, JavaScript, Aerospike, SQLServer, Hadoop

work.name: LaFrancaise Group
work.summary: Part of 25-developer team building solutions for asset management, accounting and finance.
highlights: Developed core components for authentication, caching, security and frontend architecture
Built workflow engine for managing financial instruments lifecycle
Led migration from monolithic to microservices architecture
Tech stack: C#, C++, MarkLogic, Redis, SQLServer, Angular 2

work.name: CACIB
work.summary: Part of 8-developer team building automatic trading engines (low latency) for bonds markets.
highlights: Implemented connectors to financial markets
Built order negotiation systems and RFQ (request for quotes) workflows
Tech stack: C++, C#, SQL, FIX, ZeroMQ, ION Platform, Low level TCP/UDP

work.name: Societe Generale Investment Bank
work.summary: Part of 5-developer team building grid-computing solution for financial risk indicators on large portfolios.
highlights: Designed pricing API and data model for financial instruments
Integrated and wrapped legacy C++/C computation libraries
Implemented core algorithms for risk computation engine
Tech stack: C++, C#, SQLServer, Protobuf, Apache Cassandra, IBM Platform Symphony
